scripts.build_all: npm run build_cjs && npm run build_test
scripts.build_cjs: rm -rf dist && tsc src/index.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist --sourcemap --sourceRoot src --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --noImplicitThis --noUnusedLocals --noUnusedParameters --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers --lib es5,es2015.iterable,es2015.collection,es2015.promise,dom
scripts.build_test: rm -rf spec-js && tsc test/run.ts -m commonjs --outDir spec-js --sourcemap  --target ES2015 --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node
scripts.watch_cjs: tsc src/index.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist --sourcemap --sourceRoot src --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers --lib es5,es2015.iterable,es2015.collection,es2015.promise,dom -w
scripts.watch_test: tsc test/run.ts -m commonjs --outDir spec-js --sourcemap  --target ES2015 --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node -w & ts-node ./tools/watch.ts
